formClosedMessage: Online signups are currently closed for the Summer. Do not worry though, you can still fly over summer! Please use the Facebook group to organise trips to Cranwell yourself.
landingPageNotice:
Gliding Signups

Before continuing please make sure you have purchased a Gliding Membership from the SU website. Without a membership, you won't be allowed to fly!

If you are a regular member and have flown with us before you can skip straight to the signup form, if you are new to gliding then please take the time to read this page.

New members signing up for the first time are required to signup in person to give you the chance to meet us and ask any questions you may have. It doesn't take long and normally involves a cheeky beer (or whatever you fancy) in Mooch afterwards! Signing up online without prior attending a signup session will result in your submission been removed.

You can attend any of the sessions below to signup for the following weekend's flying:

  • Tuesday 15th May, 7:00pm - Portland D137

If you have any questions regarding the signup process, please email flyingorganiser@nugc.net

fields.name: Next-Of-Kin
fields.label: Next-Of-Kin Number:
fields.description: We are required to collect a phone number of a next-of-kin in case of emergency

fields.name: Flown Before?
fields.label: Have you flown before?:
fields.description: If you haven't flown with NUGC before you are required to attend a short information evening before signing up to fly
fields.options:
Yes, I have flown with the club before
No, but I have already attended an information evening

fields.name: Day
fields.label: Which day(s) would you like to fly this weekend?
fields.options:
Saturday
Sunday
Either day
Both days (if space allows)

fields.name: Driver
fields.label: Do you have a car and would you be willing to drive people to Cranwell?

fields.name: Number Of Seats
fields.label: If you can drive, how many spare seats does your car have?

fields.name: Other
fields.label: If you have any extra information (i.e. special requirements), please add it here
